description: Norma Reed is one of the longest-running dress stores in Toronto! Established in 1976 the high fashion boutique has been in operation for 42 years making it one of Canada's oldest fashion institutions. With thousands of dresses on display inspired by current fashions from Paris to L.A., the company welcomes visitors to come in to browse the current trends in the world of couture. Norma Reed often supports local Toronto fashion designers, filmmakers, pageants, artists and independent fashion shows with pieces for their art. In fact,​​ dozens of Canadian pageant contestants have won their crowns wearing a dress from Norma Reed! Norma Reed has also become known as THE place to go for generations by thousands of high school students when looking for Graduation and Prom Dresses in Toronto. In fact, the best compliment we receive is when a mother who bought her own prom dress from us, now brings in their daughter for their prom. It is something quite magical and touching to see!

reviews.title: Love shopping here
text: This store is so helpful thank you so much to Diana and Safiya for making the process of finding my daughters dress so easy!!!

reviews.title: Amazing experience
text: I took my daughter prom dress shopping. We were approached as soon as we came into the store by the friendly staff. Chris and Brooke were right there to help get in and out of dresses.  We had a very positive experience and came home with a stunning gown. Would recommend 100%.

reviews.title: Prom Dress Shopping
text: An amazing experience for my daughter trying on prom dresses ! Kristina was an amazing help and found the perfect dress!

reviews.title: Great Location! Great Staff!
text: I went to the Oshawa Norma Reed and had an amazing experience. Kristina, Diana and Alyssa were so helpful! Thank you!!!!

reviews.title: Gorgeous Dresses
text: Gorgeous dresses at the Oshawa location! Jayden and Melissa helped me find my prom dress. Couldn’t be more pleased with the experience!

reviews.title: Had the most helpful people find my prom dress!
text: Visited the oshawa store today: Brooke in Oshawa was an amazing help!! Found my dream prom dress for my senior prom!

reviews.title: Prom dress shopping
text: Went to pick daughter’s grad dress at Oshawa center. Alyssa was very helpful. Ordered in the dress color we wanted - great staff and service

reviews.title: Discovering Norma Reed
text: I have been welled receive there and the girls that received me helped a lot with choosing the dresses and wearing it. I found something beautifull.  And the dresses quality is really good. Hope i can have mor discount next time. Thank you

reviews.title: Dreses
text: Great dresses friendly staff loved the dress I picked out but had lost rihnestones always shop here

reviews.title: Great Service
text: We have been to the Oshawa location Kris was awesome !! We have been here so many times and everyone was so helpful thank you

reviews.title: Smelly broken dresses - rude staff
text: Unfortunately our experience was not great at Oshawa or Fairview.  There were a couple of staff at each place who seemed like they wanted to help, but they were the greeters or the ones putting dresses away.  The ones taking care of the change rooms were rude, miserable and only seemed to care about selling a dress.  The one dress we tried on in Oshawa stunk like body odour - very badly.  When we went to Fairview and tried on the same dress, we also found out it had an extra piece that was missing on the dress in Oshawa.  Zero disclosure  - just want to sell the dress.  Also, if you are anything other than a perfect size 2, then don't expect a good selection.  The girl ahead of us left with her dad stating 'i swear if they tell me I have to "size up" one more time.....'.  They also did that to us.  No offer to grab another dress - see if there is another size.  Just a rude, impatient "you're gonna have to size up".  Don't waste your time or energy going to either of these money hungry zero customer service stores.  Spend your hard earned money somewhere else.

reviews.title: AMAZING EXPERIENCE ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
text: AMAZING SERVICE AND STAFF Oshawa location!!  Wow blown away by the staff…helpful, kind, and know how to treat guests!  We loved our experience at this store!  My daughter found the perfect Prom dress and the staff were so helpful at this location!

reviews.title: One of a kind store!
text: I came in to find a dress for a film wrap party - was so worried after not being able to find anything I liked anywhere! The staff took the time to go through with me what I wanted, helped me try on a ton of different options, and even were able to get alterations done! I felt so supported and like I had brought some friends with me while choosing the dress, would HIGHLY recommend to anyone! Already telling all my family and friends about the store haha!

reviews.title: Wonderful! One of the best shopping experiences!!!
text: I came in with my mom to buy dresses to go on vacation. We found the most BEAUTIFUL dresses, the woman working that day was so kind to me. So patient. I was never a dress person and she took the time to come with me and help me find dresses that would suit me. She did the same thing with my mom. We were in the Oshawa location for over 2 hours and it was such a pleasant experience! Would recommend coming here to Anyone!!!!! Such a great experience.

reviews.title: Very disappointing service
text: Disappointing service - WILL NOT SHOP HERE AGAIN NOR RECOMMEND!!  I was looking for a dress for my daughter's wedding. I found one but it was not my size. Jesse in the Oshawa store assured me they could alter the dress and insert a corset backing for me. I was hesitant but trusted her knowledge and experience that the dress would fit. Alterations were to be complete on September 6th (wedding was Sept 19th). I received a call on the 5th asking for another week to perform the alterations - they wanted to ensure they did a good job!  I arrived at the store on the 12th but the dress was not ready yet. Received a call on the 13th the dress was ready but the shawl would be in the next day. I arrived at the store on the 15th and the dress didn't fit!!! The corset strap was too short, the sides were not let out and panels were not put in - which resulted in the straps coming out of my arm pits (many other small disappointing points but these were the big ones). This was my last day to pick up the dress.  They would not issue a refund!  They assured me they would make further alterations and then deliver to my home on Thursday evening.  BUT - The dress still didn't fit! the straps didn't stay up and still didn't align properly (coming out of my arm pits still) and the bust line was WAY too low (still). Sides were not let out and side panels were not inserted.  The corset piece barely covered my back!  I wore a sweater over the dress all day but felt very uncomfortable. VERY DISAPPOINTING for paying over $500.00!!!  Was offered a free costume jewelry necklace for my trouble!  WILL NOT SHOP HERE AGAIN NOR RECOMMEND!!

reviews.title: Prom Dress
text: Amazing service! I came to buy a Prom dress and they did amazing alterations. They have a huge variety of prom dresses and they are very helpful. Will recommend to others!!

reviews.title: Great place to find a dress
text: Visited Norma Reed on Feb 29 not knowing what dress we wanted. Nahid gave us an idea on what styles would look good on my daughters figure. She was very helpful and very patient with our indecisiveness. If you are looking for a dress or an event, come to Norma Reed. You will definitely find a dress there.

reviews.title: Great selection with inhouse tailor
text: Love the selection in store and the fact that some dresses can be altered by its inhouse tailor. Great custom service too.

reviews.title: Amazing customer service
text: Salesperson was very friendly and helpful, assisted in selecting the perfect dress. Constructive advice.

reviews.title: Dress
text: Other than the hot store temp great place to shop wide variety of choice. Friendly staff and good atmosphere.

reviews.title: Beautiful dresses
text: Very beautiful dresses for my little angel and reasonable prices. Highly recommended for your parties and wedding shopping

reviews.title: Oshawa Centre Location
text: Came here for a dress for prom. The employee was super welcoming and made me and my family feel comfortable! Loved the experience here! Great customer service and great dresses.

reviews.title: Norma reed Oshawa
text: Very helpful and great customer service, laneisha helped me find the perfect dress. Very much appreciated

reviews.title: Amazing Experience
text: Was looking for an outfit for my sons engagement part and left with a beautiful jumpsuit. Brooke was amazing, very helpful and kind. Will definitely be back!

reviews.title: Patient staff
text: Great service, go there for you dress. I went for a last min shop and tried on 10 or so dresses and the staff didn’t stop until I found the perfect one

reviews.title: Wonderful Experience… Again!
text: Norma Reed never fails me!! I always come here for my gowns and I always leave with a smile on my face. Thank you once again, Diana and Alyssa. Found one dress for my masquerade ball wedding and found another one for my goddaughter’s wedding in December!

reviews.title: It’s was great!
text: Norma reed Oshawa has a lot of selection and dresses. We ended up purchasing my wedding dress and my daughter’s bridesmaids dress from here! Wonderful

reviews.title: Highly recommend!
text: This has been a fantastic experience. I love shopping at Norma Reed it has been my go to dress store since 2019. I would love to say thank you to Ashley and Alyssa for their amazing help.

reviews.title: Norma Reed
text: The service was excellent. I had a great shopping experience. I appreciate the help from Ashley and Alyssa.

reviews.title: The Worst Experience
text: I doubt if the store really exists. I have placed an order on May 27 and until now I didn’t receive the dress. I asked them about my order by email and messages but no one answered! I called the number on their website and was told they don’t know about online sales. It’s been over a month since I paid $365.99 for the dress and get nothing. I have to buy another dress for my son’s wedding now.

reviews.title: Dress shopping
text: Amazing experience
The people were so nice and very helpful didn’t  feel rushed. Made some great suggestions.

reviews.title: Oshawa centre Norma reed
text: Came in for a prom dress at the Oshawa centre Norma reed and was helped by kris quickly and efficiently, store had exactly what I wanted and service was awesome
Would recommend them to anyone that needs a dress

reviews.title: Oshawa centre location
text: Visted the Oshawa Centre location. Jayden was extremely helpful and kind the last few times I've visited. The dresses are priced really well and are extremely good quality. Would definitely recommend to any one looking for good quality formal dresses!

reviews.title: Norma Reed Oshawa location
text: We had the absolute pleasure of dealing with Deana at the Oshawa location. She made the whole experience of finding the perfect prom dress fun, stress free and her patience and expertise and friendliness guided us to the one!!! Would recommend everyone to shop here. Don’t waste your time elsewhere!

reviews.title: Dress Shopping
text: Had a great experience at the Oshawa centre! Liara and Alyssa were very helpful, and provided us with great assistance!

reviews.title: Great experience
text: From Australia shopping for gowns at Oshawa Centre Norma Reed. The workers were extremely helpful and walked out with 2 gowns!

reviews.title: Amazing customer service
text: My daughter and I had the most wonderful experience at the Oshawa location with Diana and Jayden. She said yes to the dress!!

reviews.title: Christmas party
text: I found my romper without hassle and Alyssa the sales rep was very very nice and professional. Love my rompers

reviews.title: Wonderful experience
text: Wonderful staff, very helpful. Friendly. Would recommend to shop here. Had suck a fun experience  with Diana and Jayden at the oshawa cebter norma reed!

reviews.title: Fun time shopping for dresses
text: Alyssa and Diana were super helpful and kind while shopping for goddess dresses! They made the experience super fun :)
